title: Hospitality Practical Competency Enhancement: Computer-supported Collaborative Learning Strategies in Multicultural Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can communicate effectively within multicultural teams using CSCL (Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning) tools (e.g., LMS forums, collaborative software).
Learners can design optimal collaboration strategies by linking their thinking styles (e.g., analytical/intuitive) with team roles.
Learners can propose role-distribution plans considering cultural differences and reflect execution results in evaluative feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
